name: Bugfix
description:
In Bugfix you need to find and fix the bugs of old retro games.

Imagine you, playing as freelancer, fixing other peoples games for money. That is exactly what Jeff does for a living. But now he's short on his rent bill and he has only little time left. Luckily he just discovered fixmygame.io, a platform, where dozens of people look for people just like Jeff.

Credits

Art
Anna (Cabochon Games)

Music / Sound
Dallas McKinney
